ModMetaData.name: Hyper Shrooms and Flowers
ModMetaData.author: TheGoofyOne
ModMetaData.description:
Introducing Hyper Shrooms and Hyper Flowers
Hypershrooms grow and glow in the dark and are harvest-able for an edible mushroom with the protien of meat. Grow Days - 24, Sow Skill Min - 8, Harvest Yield - 10 Hypershrooms can be ground/smashed to produce hyperweave fibers at a tailoring bench. 50 Hypershrooms make 10 Hyperweave
Hyper Flowers produce hyperweave. Grow Days - 30, Sow Skill Min - 12, Harvest Yield - 3
Why not a Hyperweave Floor? OK That too then... Less flammable and stays much cleaner than normal carpets.
